name: Aventurero
4pc: Al abrir un cofre, se regenera un 30% de Vida durante 5 s.

flower.name: Adventurer's Flower
flower.description: A resilient flower that survived the harsh environment of an ancient city. It is now proudly worn like a medal.

plume.name: Adventurer's Tail Feather
plume.description: The feather of an exotic bird rarely seen on this continent.

sands.name: Adventurer's Pocket Watch
sands.description: It's easy to lose track of time when you're adventuring where the sun doesn't shine, whether that's the depths of the abyss or the ruins of a lost city.

goblet.name: Adventurer's Golden Goblet
goblet.description: The spoils of one of an adventurer's many expeditions. Though a little damaged, it is still an excellent find.

circlet.name: Adventurer's Bandana
circlet.description: A cloth garment worn at the forehead. Though soaked in sweat and covered in dust, it still beams with an adventurer's pride.

name: Petra Arcaica
4pc: Al obtener un cristal creado a través de la reacción de Cristalización, todos los miembros del equipo obtienen durante 10 s un 35% de Bono de Daño Elemental que causó dicha reacción. Solo se puede tener un tipo de Bono de Daño Elemental a la vez

flower.name: Flower of Creviced Cliff
flower.description: A flower born of the minerals and rocks of cliffside cracks. The way its petals blow in the wind makes it seem alive.

plume.name: Feather of Jagged Peaks
plume.description: A hard feather from a large seacliff hawk. The basalt tip of the feather sometimes glistens with a cool dew.

sands.name: Sundial of Enduring Jade
sands.description: A sundial carved from a single, large piece of jade. It's lined with a pattern that silently records the passage of time.

goblet.name: Goblet of Chiseled Crag
goblet.description: A resplendent yet dignified wine goblet, once filled to the brim in an era long gone.

circlet.name: Mask of Solitude Basalt
circlet.description: A solemn mask exquisitely carved from basalt. Its hollow eyes stare ahead expressionless and cold.

name: Berserker
4pc: Cuando la Vida es menor al 70%, aumenta la Prob. CRI un 24%.

flower.name: Berserker's Rose
flower.description: An exquisite flower that has been dyed red. It represents the qualities of the Berserker.

plume.name: Berserker's Indigo Feather
plume.description: An indigo feather from a legendary raven, part of which has been dyed crimson red.

sands.name: Berserker's Timepiece
sands.description: An instrument with an eternal flow that continues mercilessly within, reminding the Berserker of the limited time he has left — both on the battlefield as well as in the world.

goblet.name: Berserker's Bone Goblet
goblet.description: A goblet made from the bone of an unknown beast. It was taken as a trophy after some deadly encounter.

circlet.name: Berserker's Battle Mask
circlet.description: A hideous iron mask that has been left half-shattered from vicious battles.

name: Nómada del Invierno
4pc: Aumenta en 20% la Prob. CRIT contra los enemigos afectados por Cryo. Si el enemigo está Congelado, la Prob. CRIT aumentará en un 20% adicional.

name: Caballería Sanguinaria

4: Clear Pool and Mountain Cavern (Levels I-III)
5: Clear Pool and Mountain Cavern (Levels II-III)

4pc: Derrotar a un enemigo hace que no consumas Aguante al lanzar un Ataque Cargado, y que el daño de Ataque Cargado aumente en un 50% durante 10 s.

flower.name: Bloodstained Flower of Iron
flower.description: A dried flower stained black with blood and now as hard as steel. Probably some sort of a memento for it's former master.

plume.name: Bloodstained Black Plume
plume.description: A raven feather pinned to a knight's cape. Countless bloodstains have dyed it pitch black.

sands.name: Bloodstained Final Hour
sands.description: A timepiece once used by a knight. The liquid inside has dried up, rendering it useless.

goblet.name: Bloodstained Chevalier's Goblet
goblet.description: The dark metallic vessel owned by the Bloodstained Knight. Its exterior has been stained as black as the night by smoke and coagulated blood.

circlet.name: Bloodstained Iron Mask
circlet.description: The iron mask the knight used to conceal their identity. Many have speculated about the face behind the mask.

name: Corazón del Guerrero
4pc: Incrementa el Daño un 30% contra enemigos con más del 50% de Vida.

flower.name: Medal of the Brave
flower.description: A simple flower brooch that is a keepsake from someone's first adventure.

plume.name: Prospect of the Brave
plume.description: A shimmering feather from a songbird that brings a nudge of courage to its wearer.

sands.name: Fortitude of the Brave
sands.description: A dated miniature hourglass that serves no practical purpose. It seems as elusive as time itself.

goblet.name: Outset of the Brave
goblet.description: A crude wooden vessel filled only with memories.

circlet.name: Crown of the Brave
circlet.description: A rough-and-ready laurel wreath that seems as precious as a king's golden crown.

name: Bruja Carmesí en Llamas
4pc: Aumenta el Daño causado por Sobrecarga y Qumadura en un 40%, y el de Vaporización y Derretido en un 15%. El uso de una Habilidad Elemental aumenta los efectos del conjunto de 2 piezas en un 50% durante 10 s. Puede acumularse hasta un máximo de 3 cargas.

flower.name: Witch's Flower of Blaze
flower.description: A flower touched by the witch who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The anonymous flames affectionately caress the hands of those who touch it.

plume.name: Witch's Ever-Burning Plume
plume.description: A bird feather touched by the witch who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. Its eternal flame burns hot.

sands.name: Witch's End Time
sands.description: A timepiece worn by the witch who dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The years the witch dedicated to the flames flow within.

goblet.name: Witch's Heart Flames
goblet.description: A flame-spitting urn left behind by the Crimson Witch of Flames, who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The fire in the urn burns eternally, as did its former master.

circlet.name: Witch's Scorching Hat
circlet.description: A hat once worn by the witch who dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The large brim blocked her sight.

name: Corazón del Guardián
4pc: +30% RES Elemental por cada miembro de tu equipo con un Elemento distinto.

flower.name: Guardian's Flower
flower.description: An iris that was cherished by the Guardian. Unfortunately, the chance never came for it to be given to whom the Guardian loved.

plume.name: Guardian's Sigil
plume.description: A feather-shaped brooch that symbolizes someone's yearning to defend others like a shield.

sands.name: Guardian's Clock
sands.description: A small timekeeping gadget. On moonless nights, it was the only way its former owner could know the time.

goblet.name: Guardian's Vessel
goblet.description: A metal vessel that can be filled with a drink to dispel the loneliness of the long watch.

circlet.name: Guardian's Band
circlet.description: A fabric band dyed indigo by the darkness of night. Can also double as a bandage in the event of an emergency.

name: Jugadora
4pc: Al derrotar a un enemigo, hay una probabilidad del 100% dereiniciar el TdE de la Habilidad Elemental. Puede ocurrir una vez cada 15 s.

flower.name: Gambler's Brooch
flower.description: A big, luxurious flower that can hide a loaded dice.

plume.name: Gambler's Feather Accessory
plume.description: The tail feather of a large bird. Perfect for discretely concealing a trump card.

sands.name: Gambler's Pocket Watch
sands.description: A shattered pocket watch that once took a lethal hit for its owner.

goblet.name: Gambler's Dice Cup
goblet.description: This vessel was specially made for a single purpose. It has absolutely no secret compartments built into it.

circlet.name: Gambler's Earrings
circlet.description: A pair of blue earrings that, when worn, calm the mind and encourage a rational assessment of risks.

name: Final del Gladiador

4: Elite Bosses and Weekly Bosses at World Level 2+
5: Elite Bosses and Weekly Bosses at World Level 3+

4pc: Aumenta el Daño de ATQ Normal en un 35% si el personaje usa una espada, mandoble o lanza.

flower.name: Gladiator's Nostalgia
flower.description: No-one knows why the legendary gladiator wore this flower on his chest. It was the brutal warrior's only weakness.

plume.name: Gladiator's Destiny
plume.description: A feather of dreams that soars free like an eagle. At the end of the gladiator's legendary life, this parting gift was left upon his chest by a bird that knew true freedom.

sands.name: Gladiator's Longing
sands.description: A timepiece that recorded the gladiator's days in the bloodstained Colosseum. To him, it counted down the days on his long road to freedom.

goblet.name: Gladiator's Intoxication
goblet.description: The golden cup a champion gladiator drank from in ancient times. It brimmed with his glory for years until the fateful day of his fall.

circlet.name: Gladiator's Triumphus
circlet.description: The helmet of a legendary gladiator from ancient times, who would proudly stretch out his bloodied arms to welcome the thunderous applause of his audience.

name: Corazón de las Profundidades
4pc: Tras usar la Habilidad Elemental, aumenta el daño de Ataque Normal y Ataque Cargado en un 30% durante 15 s.

name: Instructor
4pc: Después de activar una Reacción Elemental, aumenta la Maestría Elemental de todos los miembros del equipo en 120 pts. durante 8 s.

flower.name: Instructor's Brooch
flower.description: Whenever the instructor wore this brooch, it meant there would be no training sessions that day.

plume.name: Instructor's Feather Accessory
plume.description: Any instructor who has mastered the art of de-escalation knows to keep this accessory firmly in their grasp at all times.

sands.name: Instructor's Pocket Watch
sands.description: A stopwatch used not for general timekeeping but to measure the duration of a training session.

goblet.name: Instructor's Tea Cup
goblet.description: It may seem like an ordinary tea cup to most. But to students, it is the symbol of the instructor's authority.

circlet.name: Instructor's Cap
circlet.description: A standard-issue honorary instructor's cap, only granted to those who turn down a promotion.

name: Virtuoso Corredor de Lava
4pc: Aumenta el daño contra enemigos afectados por Pyro un 35%

flower.name: Lavawalker's Resolution
flower.description: A flower that blooms amidst burning flames. It is said that long ago, a sage once wore it as he walked into a sea of fire.

plume.name: Lavawalker's Salvation
plume.description: The feather of a proud phoenix. You can almost hear the sound of its wings flapping in the scorching flames.

sands.name: Lavawalker's Torment
sands.description: Burning sand flows within this hourglass. Despite the intense heat, the sand leave no mark upon the vessel that houses it.

goblet.name: Lavawalker's Epiphany
goblet.description: A legendary goblet that can withstand extremely high temperatures. It still retains a degree of warmth even though it is now empty.

circlet.name: Lavawalker's Wisdom
circlet.description: The circlet of a sage who traversed a sea of fire. It once shone brightly from their ancient silhouette as they stood strong amidst the flames.

name: Afortunado
4pc: Recoger Mora restaura 300 de vida

flower.name: Lucky Dog's Clover
flower.description: A four-leaf clover that grows in the wild. It was picked because it is said to bring good luck.

plume.name: Lucky Dog's Eagle Feather
plume.description: A monster once cornered an adventurer, but was then picked off by a hunting eagle... That eagle dropped this feather, which now carries some of the adventurer's good luck.

sands.name: Lucky Dog's Hourglass
sands.description: A broken hourglass from which all the sand has escaped. But it's fine, because the passage of time means nothing to someone without a single worry in the whole world.

goblet.name: Lucky Dog's Goblet
goblet.description: An exquisite metallic vessel that was once used to knock out a thief.

circlet.name: Lucky Dog's Silver Circlet
circlet.description: Its former owner once fell into a cave and found the treasure trove of an exiled royal. This is a souvenir from that incident.

name: Doncella Amada
2pc: Aumenta en un 15% la curación realizada.
4pc: El uso de una Habilidad Elemental o Habilidad Definitiva aumenta en un 20% la curación recibida por todos los miembros del equipo durante 10 s.

flower.name: Maiden's Distant Love
flower.description: A fragrant flower that will bloom for all eternity and never wither.

plume.name: Maiden's Heart-stricken Infatuation
plume.description: A feathered accessory that carries the longing for a certain someone, like a migratory bird on the wind.

sands.name: Maiden's Passing Youth
sands.description: The hands of time will never come to an end, but the same cannot be said for those cherished years of the young maiden's life when she was doted upon.

goblet.name: Maiden's Fleeting Leisure
goblet.description: A vessel made with sweet black tea in mind rather than bitter liquor.

circlet.name: Maiden's Fading Beauty
circlet.description: A meticulously well-maintained woman's hat that keeps wrinkles safely out of sight.

name: Artista Marcial
2pc: Daño por Ataque Normal y Aatque Cargado +15%
4pc: Después de usar la Habilidad Elemental, aumenta el Daño de Ataque Normal y Ataque Cargado en un 25% durante 8 s.

flower.name: Martial Artist's Red Flower
flower.description: This particular kind of red flower was the only thing that could alleviate the Martial Artist's pain.

plume.name: Martial Artist's Feather Accessory
plume.description: A common bird feather. Experts use it to practice strength control, while rookies use it to make fans.

sands.name: Martial Artist's Water Hourglass
sands.description: A tool to keep track of time in endurance training. It is more accurate and reliable than a regular hourglass.

goblet.name: Martial Artist's Wine Cup
goblet.description: A rather exquisite wine cup used in pre-combat rituals.

circlet.name: Martial Artist's Bandana
circlet.description: The first lesson as an apprentice: Vigor, Strength, Will. These words are written on the bandana so you'll never forget them.

name: Ritual Antiguo de la Nobleza
4pc: Usar una habilidad definitiva aumenta el ataque de los miembros del equipo un 20% durante 12s. Este efecto no es acumulable

flower.name: Royal Flora
flower.description: A satin flower with a glossy finish, fit for an elegant gathering. It still looks as distinguished as it did on the day it was cast aside.

plume.name: Royal Plume
plume.description: A feathered hat accessory worn by the old aristocrats of Mondstadt on hunts. It still stands proudly as if no time has passed.

sands.name: Royal Pocket Watch
sands.description: A pocket watch that once belonged to the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Passed down from generation to generation, it has witnessed many years of history.

goblet.name: Royal Silver Urn
goblet.description: An ornamental urn that once belonged to the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Mournful winds seem to echo within its empty interior.

circlet.name: Royal Masque
circlet.description: A masquerade mask worn by the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Its hollow eyes are fixated on the golden days of the past.

name: Ritual del Destino
1pc: Reduce la duración de los efectos causados por Hydro en un 40%.

circlet.name: Tiara of Torrents
circlet.description: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Because it was submerged in water year in and year out, it possesses remarkable resistance.

name: Ritual de la Iluminación
1pc: Reduce la duración de los efectos causados por Pyro en un 40%.

circlet.name: Tiara of Flame
circlet.description: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. After being subjected to the dancing sacrificial flames year in and year out, it possesses remarkable resistance.

name: Ritual de la Sabiduría
1pc: Reduce la duración de los efectos causados por Electro en un 40%.

circlet.name: Tiara of Thunder
circlet.description: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Because it harkened the call of thunder year in and year out, it possesses remarkable resistance.

name: Ritual de la Primavera
1pc: Reduce la duración de los efectos causados por Cryo en un 40%.

circlet.name: Tiara of Frost
circlet.description: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Because it once weathered years of icy cold, it possesses remarkable resistance.

name: Corazón del Viajero
4pc: Prob. CRIT de Ataque Cargado +30%

flower.name: Heart of Comradeship
flower.description: A small cerulean flower with somebody's ribbon pinned to the stem.

plume.name: Feather of Homecoming
plume.description: A blue arrow fletching imbued with the sentiment of travelers that had once faded into the horizon.

sands.name: Sundial of the Sojourner
sands.description: A sundial that has survived the ages, always silently recording the cycles of the sun and moon as they pass through the sky.

goblet.name: Goblet of the Sojourner
goblet.description: A plain porcelain goblet that was once brimming with joyous brews.

circlet.name: Crown of Parting
circlet.description: A reed coronet that emanates the spring breeze.

name: Retroceso del Meteorito
4pc: Los Ataques Normales y Cargados obtienen un 40% de daño adicional mientras estés bajo la protección de un escudo.

flower.name: Summer Night's Bloom
flower.description: A man-made flower in eternal bloom. Who knows if there truly is life in there?

plume.name: Summer Night's Finale
plume.description: A well-crafted wooden dart. It will only stop once it has reached its destination.

sands.name: Summer Night's Moment
sands.description: A pocketwatch that has stopped at a certain point in time.

goblet.name: Summer Night's Waterballoon
goblet.description: Water balloons can be seen everywhere during the summer festival, but none are as finely-wrought as this one.

circlet.name: Summer Night's Mask
circlet.description: A popular mask cast in the image of a deity, as described in the legends.

name: Erudita
4pc: Al obtener partículas u orbes elementales, los miembros del equipo que usen arco o catalizador recuperan 3 pts. adicionales de Energía Elemental. Solo puede suceder una vez cada 3 s.

flower.name: Scholar's Bookmark
flower.description: A dried flower used as a bookmark, it had absorbed the scent from the pages.

plume.name: Scholar's Quill Pen
plume.description: A bird’s feather that serves as a quill pen, the tip has long been stained black.

sands.name: Scholar's Clock
sands.description: A small desktop clock, whose former owner was a scholar sat in a windowless room buried in books. This was probably the only reference they had to the time of day.

goblet.name: Scholar's Ink Cup
goblet.description: Originally designed to hold drinking water, this cup was stained black after a scholar used it to wash their paint brushes.

circlet.name: Scholar's Lens
circlet.description: This corrective lens helped restore the vision of one whose eyes were damaged from intensive studying.

name: Legado
4pc: Al usar la Habilidad Definitiva, todos los miembros del equipo (a excepción de tu personaje en uso) recuperan 2 pts. de Energía Elemental cada 2 s durante 6 s. Este efecto no puede acumularse.

flower.name: Exile's Flower
flower.description: A withered flower worn on the shirt. Its former owner insisted on wearing it even in exile, so it must mean something.

plume.name: Exile's Feather
plume.description: Not an actual accessory per se. Just a random bird feather that was found somewhere in the wilderness by the exile.

sands.name: Exile's Pocket Watch
sands.description: Even after the crystal watch face was shattered and the hands lost, its former owner kept it until the end.

goblet.name: Exile's Goblet
goblet.description: A dull goblet made of a heavy metal. It was once inlaid with gemstones, but they have since been stripped off.

circlet.name: Exile's Circlet
circlet.description: A prestigious circlet. However, the royal insignia has been scratched out, and it is no longer the symbol of distinguished status that it once was.

name: Furia del Trueno
4pc: Aumenta el daño causado por reacciones elementales que involucran al elementl Electro un 40%. Activar tales efectos disminuye el tiempo de reutilización de la habilidad elemental por 1s. Sólo puede ocurrir una vez cada 0.8s

flower.name: Thunderbird's Mercy
flower.description: A lightning-infused flower, somehow spared the fate of being trodden underfoot or reduced to ash by the furious purple fire, making it the sole survivor on the day of disaster.

plume.name: Survivor of Catastrophe
plume.description: The lost feather of the Thunderbird enchanted in purple lightning. It serves as the last witness of the destruction of the tribe.

sands.name: Hourglass of Thunder
sands.description: The hourglass used to foretell the coming of the Thunderbird by the tribe that worshiped it. It has fallen into eternal silence now that the tribe is no more.

goblet.name: Omen of Thunderstorm
goblet.description: A ceremonial cup that holds the blood of the innocent. It is brimming with the thundering fury of the prayers that echo within.

circlet.name: Thunder Summoner's Crown
circlet.description: In the ancient tribe that worshipped the Thunderbird, elder shamans wore this crown.

name: Domador de Truenos
4pc: Aumenta el daño contra enemigos afectados por Electro un 35%

flower.name: Thundersoother's Heart
flower.description: A flower that blooms even amidst ferocious thunder and lightning. To this day, it still grants courage to travelers in thunderstorms.

plume.name: Thundersoother's Plume
plume.description: The feather of a predatory bird that soars through lightning storms. It was said to have been adopted as an insignia by the legendary hero who pacified thunder and lightning.

sands.name: Hour of Soothing Thunder
sands.description: A timepiece kept by hero who conquered thunder and lightning. The tiny shard of Electro crystal within flow back and forth with the passing of time.

goblet.name: Thundersoother's Goblet
goblet.description: The wine goblet from which the Thundersoother, who defeated the Beast of Thunder, once drank violet lightning.

circlet.name: Thundersoother's Diadem
circlet.description: The crown given to the Thundersoother for defeating the Beast of Thunder that had been wreaking havoc upon the land.

name: Milagro
4pc: El Daño Elemental recibido aumenta la RES Elemental correspondiente en un 30% durante 10 s. Solo puede ocurrir una vez cada 10 s.

flower.name: Tiny Miracle's Flower
flower.description: A flower that grew from a rock, breaking through the stone as it strove to reach the light.

plume.name: Tiny Miracle's Feather
plume.description: A feather from a bird of prey that flies almost too fast for the human eye to detect.

sands.name: Tiny Miracle's Hourglass
sands.description: Just an ordinary everyday hourglass. Turn it upside down and sure enough, the dry sand starts trickling down like water.

goblet.name: Tiny Miracle's Goblet
goblet.description: A cup commonly used for fortunetelling. It can also hold water, of course.

circlet.name: Tiny Miracle's Earrings
circlet.description: A cheap accessory that is actually made from ancient meteoric ore.

name: Curativo
4pc: Al lanzar una Habilidad Definitiva, restaura 20% de Vida

flower.name: Traveling Doctor's Silver Lotus
flower.description: A precious medicinal ingredient that has lost all medicinal value after years in storage.

plume.name: Traveling Doctor's Owl Feather
plume.description: The durable feather of an owl. Emblematic of nocturnal supremacy, it gave some encouragement to the Traveling Doctor when venturing out to visit patients late at night.

sands.name: Traveling Doctor's Pocket Watch
sands.description: A precise instrument used for keeping time. For a doctor, every second counts.

goblet.name: Traveling Doctor's Medicine Pot
goblet.description: This pot used to carry concentrated and extremely potent concoctions. It is now empty, but still gives off a strong smell of medicine.

circlet.name: Traveling Doctor's Handkerchief
circlet.description: Used to tie back the doctor's hair when treating patients. Can also be used as a sling for sprains and broken arms in emergencies.

name: Sombra Verde Esmeralda
4pc: Aumenta el Daño de Torbellino en un 60%. Dependiendo del tipo elemental que tenga, disminuye la RES Elemental correspondiente del oponente en un 40% durante 10 s.

flower.name: In Remembrance of Viridescent Fields
flower.description: A wild flower that was once a ubicuitous sight in its homeland. It was picked by a hunter who wore it on their chest.

plume.name: Viridescent Arrow Feather
plume.description: The fletching of an arrow that once pierced right through its prey, but somehow still remains spotless.

sands.name: Viridescent Venerer's Determination
sands.description: A wondrous instrument that a hunter once wore. It forever points towards their prey.

goblet.name: Viridescent Venerer's Vessel
goblet.description: A water pouch used by the Viridescent Venerer. Its capacity is much greater than one would expect.

circlet.name: Viridescent Venerer's Diadem
circlet.description: A proud crown that once belonged to the Viridescent Venever. It is as lush and green as the breezes of the wild.

name: Orquesta del Errante
4pc: Aumenta el daño del ataque cargado un 35% si el personaje usa un catalizador o arco

flower.name: Troupe's Dawnlight
flower.description: A small flower-shaped insignia. If you listen carefully, you can almost hear a flute playing and voices singing.

plume.name: Bard's Arrow Feather
plume.description: An azure arrow fletching that has neither faded nor splintered with the passage of time. The sound of running water seems to linger around it.

sands.name: Concert's Final Hour
sands.description: An hourglass used to keep time during a band performance. It once made a crisp sound, but their performance has since ended.

goblet.name: Wanderer's String Kettle
goblet.description: An ancient, strangely-shaped canteen. The interior is fitted with harp strings, which plays a wondrous tune as the water flows out.

circlet.name: Conductor's Top Hat
circlet.description: A top hat that has managed to retain its radiance despite braving the elements for time untold. An ancient tune still resonates within.
